title: Weight training
description: A method focused on building muscle strength and size through resistance exercises using weights.

title: Calisthenics
description: A bodyweight training method that emphasizes functional movements to improve strength, flexibility, and endurance without the need for equipment.

title: Power Lifting
description: A strength training method that focuses on three main lifts: squat, bench press, and deadlift, aiming to maximize overall strength.

title: functional training
description: A training method that focuses on exercises mimicking everyday movements to improve overall body function and coordination.

title: Yoga
description: A holistic practice combining physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to enhance flexibility, balance, and mental well-being.

title: Cardio
description: A cardiovascular training method aimed at improving heart health and endurance through activities like running, cycling, and swimming.
